subject: Re: [junit] Do we need to convince management of the benefits of unit tests?
msgSnippet: ... Ouch! I *really* wish that wasn t so. It doesn t say anything good about our profession. Simon -- simonpeter.org | simonpeter.com | techbook.info
messageBody:
On 10/5/06, David Saff <saff@...> wrote:
> J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
> >
> > I am not a Microsoft basher any more, but I still believe that
> > SourceSafe is actually /worse/ than no version control. I feel similarly
> > about ClearCase, although not as strongly.
> >
>
> Well, it's good to know that the market follows reason: "Nothing at all"
> still leads every other version-control strategy in market share.

Ouch!

I *really* wish that wasn't so. It doesn't say anything good about our
profession.

Simon

--
simonpeter.org | simonpeter.com | techbook.info
